attributes.action:
Muzzle all dogs not just the XL BULLY! 
Rule for all breeds. Or no rule at all!
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the ban on our xl bullys. Don’t make us muzzle train our dogs. They loose out on playing with their balls and sticks. 

Make every owner have their dog muzzled not just one breed!
attributes.background:
Chihuahua, Jack Russells, are the most aggressive dogs out there and bite children unprovoked.

XLs are family dogs and are most loyal and loving

Ban the bad owners not the breed!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Make all dogs no matter what breed muzzled in public:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633198

Require leads, muzzles and licences for all dogs:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638225
